General.Name: Shanghai Morn Electric Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Morn Electric Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sales of cables. The company provides wind power, photovoltaic, battery connection, industrial robot, industrial drag chain, photoelectric composite automation equipment mobile flexible, railway rolling stock, flame retardant B1 environmental protection, fireproof, mineral insulated, and medium voltage fireproof cables, as well as medium, high, and low voltage power cables. It offers its products to electric power, rail transit, construction engineering, new energy, communications, ships/ships, intelligent equipment, metallurgy, petrochemical, port machinery and marine engineering, industrial and mining, and other fields. Shanghai Morn Electric Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xie  Zhang
1.Title: CFO, Sec., In Charge of Accounting & Director
